desc: Specifies the IEEE-1284 device ID to match when listing drivers with the -m option
comma-separated list of device or PPD schemes that should be excluded from the results
comma-separated list of device or PPD schemes that should be included in the results
Specifies the language to match when listing drivers with the -m option
Specifies the make and model to match when listing drivers with the -m option
Specifies the product to match when listing drivers with the -m option
Specifies the timeout when listing devices with the -v option (sec)
